jd:
Hi, I am reaching out to you about an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Please review the requirements and let me know if you are interested in this position.

Job Title: FullStack Developer (70%/30% backend vs Front end)
Location: Plano TX OR Reston VA - In person interviews only
Duration: 8+ Months

Onsite Job Description :
Core Java
Angular
Spring/Spring Boot
AWS
Testing Experience

Angular, Core Java, Spring, Testing Experience and AWS (In no particular order) are the only things we look for
Testing Experience with associated test frameworks, unit/regression testing, T-Shaped developer
Doesn’t need to be UI expert but we definitely need someone able to grasp Angular concepts and someone that has previous hand’s on experience
AWS extensive experience also isn’t a huge dealbreaker but being able to navigate components like EC2, S3 are a must.. application this person would be supporting is fully hosted in cloud environment, person doesn’t need to be “expert” but also can’t have zero experience at same time
Seems AWS is the only area they can compromise, if the person is very proficient in other areas
Not a senior or Lead level position, but they definitely need someone that is a self-starter and doesn’t require extensive hand-holding
Can’t have someone that relies heavily on lead for delegating work, must be inquisitive and able to problem solve
